Text:
Good upload, but the movie sucked balls.

Needed way better casting and a whole of a-lot better script.
it needed massive explosions that blow holes into the ground and wipe out cities.  and of course the famous "crapping your pants" powering up scenes.
I think anime should stay anime... but still nice upload x

most people dont download something they are not interested in though i do have to say i like this better than the anime....

and i didnt like the anime but i am downloading this to watch it a second time... 
what does that say?

Dragonball Anime is thousand times nice then this movie, the movie sucks , i watched the whole DB,DBZ and DBGT series but when ever i wakeup everyday i will like i should watch them again
